ONE AIM, ONE MISSION: “to protect and preserve Dr. LEFEBURE’s work for the future generations”.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-100px||-125px||false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ custom_margin=”||-100px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Ligne” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Publishing & Managing Editor: Daniel STIENNON
Head office: 30330 La Bastide d’Engras – FRANCE
SIRET: 339 614 463 00042
European Intracommunity N° ID: FR21 339 614 463
N° Training: 11 75 23430 75
N° CNIL: 623459

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|||-10px|false|false” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Copyrights (photos & illustrations credits):
© PHOSPHENISM Publishing library,
© Adobe Stock, Camtasia, Depositphotos, Fiverr, Flickr, Fotolia, iStock, Pexels, Pixabay, Shutterstock, Storyblocks, Unsplash, Videoblocks.
© Geo Reflection Agency.
© Registered trademark for e-books, e-courses (box sets), e-devices,
and for texts, audio & video recordings of the complete training.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.phosphenism.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/rgpd_attestation-300×199-1.jpg” title_text=”rgpd_attestation-300×199″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”]

Information concerning our PROSPECT files:

Charter of confidentiality – Protection of personal datas.

• We divulge no files whatsoever. We only collect the information necessary for establishing an invoice. Consequently, your mail wil not be sold, nor rented, nor given to anyone. We thank you for your trust.
• Our file of PROSPECT e-mails (potential clients) comes only from the Internet users who have put down their addresses on our site in order to have access to our free downloads.
• Our Newsletter (sent only to our sympathizers) is sent once every 15 days, and all our Newsletters contain a form for canceling the subscription at any time.
• It is possible for a third person to register a friend, but at any time this person can also cancel his/her subscription.
• We keep only the addresses deposited directly on our site.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”justified”]

We are fully committed to the protection of your personal information. All the personal data that we receive regarding you are treated with the utmost confidentiality.

According to the French Regulations regarding personal data on the Internet, you have the right to access, change or delete the data that you have provided to us. If you wish to exert that right, you can write to: PHOSPHENISM Publishing – Customer Service – Chemin des Rosiers 30330 LA BASTIDE D’ENGRAS, clearly indicating your first and last name, you address and your email address.

You can, whenever you choose to, have access and change the personal information in your account, in the ‟MY ACCOUNT” section.

Important: when you pass on your email to us, and for one year after the date of registration, you will receive, for free, information on the practice of Phosphenism. After a year, your subscription and your email address will be automatically deleted from our database and you will receive a mail inviting you to renew your subscription to our service. Consequently, you have to renew your subscription in order to continue receiving information from us.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#eaeaea”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center”]

General conditions

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center”]

Privacy policy (1)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center”]

Privacy policy (2)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center”]

Terms of use

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
